name: Greasy Johnny

topics.response_text: Don't rush me. We're going, okay?

topics.topic_text: I hear you've been causing trouble.
No need for violence. What'll it take for you to stop?
topics.response_text: You better make it worthwhile. I ain't going to risk my neck in The Wasteland for shit.

topics.topic_text: These people won't put up with you forever.
topics.response_text: [FAILED] Like I give a shit. Didn't I say get lost, or are you looking for a beating?

topics.topic_text: [Attack] I was hoping you'd be that stupid.
topics.response_text: What? Hey, guys! Help me here!

topics.topic_text: [Attack] I'm going to enjoy seeing you bleed.
How about if I pay you 100 caps to get out of here?
You can't really enjoy living here. Take 50 caps and get out of here.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] Heh. More than I could make in a week of shaking down these assholes anyways.

description:
Greasy Johnny is a 29 year-old Caucasian Male.

A grizzled and unkempt figure with greasy hair and a perpetual sneer, Greasy Johnny leads the Greasers gang from their squalid headquarters in the New Vegas sewers. His leather jacket is covered in dirt and questionable stains, and he smells of stale cigarettes and cheap whiskey. Though not particularly physically imposing, his aggressive demeanor and willingness to use violence make him a feared figure among the locals of North Vegas Square.

Greasy Johnny's Personality: Aggressive, territorial, and opportunistic. Greasy Johnny values strength and loyalty only insofar as they benefit him. He's quick to anger, especially when his authority is challenged, but also surprisingly cowardly when faced with genuine danger. He harbors a deep resentment toward the established authorities in New Vegas and sees his gang as a way to carve out his own piece of the wasteland.

Greasy Johnny's Backstory: Born and raised in the harsh environment of the Mojave Wasteland, Greasy Johnny learned early that only the toughest survive. He spent his youth as a raider, learning the brutal trade of intimidation and theft. After a failed attempt to join the Fiends, he gathered a small following of like-minded individuals and established the Greasers gang in the relatively isolated environment of the New Vegas sewers. From there, they've been launching petty raids and extortions against the residents of North Vegas Square, growing bolder with each successful operation.
